stories.text: Hey, guys! I'm new in startup activity so every step is hard for me yet. I've created the site to present my product but don't know is it perfect or not. I found it confusing. How do you get that your landing site is perfect? Maybe exist some must-have metrics or any article with a collection of advice? Thank you.
stories.title: How do you estimate the quality of your landing sites?

stories.text:
There was a pretty spontaneous huddle by Tim Chen at 2pm (45 minutes ago as of this post) discussing the separation before breaking out to individual VPs for Q/A, which are still ongoing.

I have no idea what the implications are, but my main interest in posting this is because of the number of people who might be looking for new roles. News came from employees at the firm reaching out to me and others to assess career options.
stories.title: Tell HN: VPs of Product, Engineering, Data All Separated from Nerd Wallet Today
